workshop.controllers.internal.rest

Class UsersRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<User>
      • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.UsersRestController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkshopRestController<User>

    @Component
 @RequestMapping(path="/internal/users",
                produces="application/hal+json;charset=UTF-8")
 @RestController
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=User.class)
public class UsersRestController
extends WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<User>

      • postUserOrder

        @PostMapping(path="{id}/orders",
             consumes={"application/json;charset=UTF-8","multipart/form-data"})
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Order\', \'post\') and hasPermission(\'User\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> postUserOrder(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   @Validated(value=PersistenceValidation.class) @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Order order,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        Receives a new Order, sets it 'createdFor' a given User and persists.
        Parameters:
        id - User.ID
        order - A new Order to be persisted.
        Returns:
        The persisted Order with this User set.

      • putUserOrder

        @PutMapping(path="{id}/orders",
            consumes={"application/json;charset=UTF-8","multipart/form-data"})
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Order\', \'put\') and hasPermission(\'User\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> putUserOrder(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               @Validated(value=MergingValidation.class) @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Order order,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        Receives an existing Order, sets it 'createdFor' a given User and updates it in the DataBase.
        Parameters:
        id - User.ID
        order - An existing Order to be set 'createdFor' this User.
        Returns:
        The updated Order with this User set.

        @PostMapping(path="{id}/authorities",
             consumes={"application/json;charset=UTF-8","multipart/form-data"})
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'ExternalAuthority\', \'post\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> postForbiddenMethodUserExternalAuthority(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.Long id,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns:
        HttpStatus.FORBIDDEN with an advice to use dedicated WorkshopRestControllerAbstract.postOne(WorkshopEntity, BindingResult, WebRequest) link for creation.

      • putUserExternalAuthority

        @PutMapping(path="{id}/authorities",
            consumes={"application/json;charset=UTF-8","multipart/form-data"})
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'ExternalAuthority\', \'put\') and hasPermission(\'User\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> putUserExternalAuthority(@PathVariable(name="id")

        Adds an ExternalAuthority to the User.
        Returns:
        HttpStatus.ACCEPTED in case of success.

      • deleteUserExternalAuthority

        @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}/authorities/{authorityId}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'ExternalAuthority\', \'put\') and hasPermission(\'User\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> deleteUserExternalAuthority(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 @PathVariable(name="authorityId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Long authorityId)
        Removes an ExternalAuthority from a User.
        Parameters:
        id - User.ID to remove ExternalAuthority from.
        authorityId - ExternalAuthority.ID to be removed from the User.
        Returns:
        HttpStatus.NO_CONTENT in case of success.
